bill.title: Relating to veterans.
bill.description: Appropriates moneys from General Fund to Oregon Department of Administrative Services for biennium beginning July 1, 2023, to provide transportation services to Roseburg Veterans Affairs Medical Center for veterans residing in Coos and Curry Counties.
